title: Behold Esports looking for a coach (Plat+)
body:
Behold Esports is currently looking for some coaches that want to gain some experience in team coaching
We are a fairly new organisation that has two i2g team running currently
We are looking for coach/coaches to assist our teams with improving and drafting better team compositions.

- Need to have clear communication skills and ability to work with different people
- Reasonably available for vod reviews and drafting
- Previous coaching experience is not required

Add me on discord - Havoc#4859
